import sys

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    b = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    c = [(a[i] + b[i]) % n for i in range(n)]
    print(*c)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

#-----Solution-----

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))

a = sorted(a)
b = sorted(b)

for i in range(n):
    print((a[i] + b[i]) % n, end=' ')

#n = int(input())
#a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
#b = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

n = 7
a = [2, 5, 1, 5, 3, 4, 3]
b = [2, 4, 3, 5, 6, 5, 1]

c = [0 for _ in range(n)]

for i in range(n):
    c[a[i]] += b[i]

d = [None for _ in range(n)]
for i in range(n):
    d[i] = (c[i], i)

d.sort()

for i in range(n):
    c[i] = d[i][1]

print(' '.join([str(x) for x in c]))
